settings.title: Common Questions About Our Diet Plans

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: What does Dt Poonam Sagar specialize in?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: Dt Poonam Sagar provides personalized diet plans designed around your unique health needs, preferences, and lifestyle. These plans focus on practical, home-cooked meals using everyday Indian foods to improve health outcomes.

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: How are the diet plans designed?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: Every plan starts with a detailed assessment of your health goals, medical condition (if any), and dietary habits. Based on this, a tailored nutrition plan is created that fits your routine and helps you achieve sustainable results.

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: Is the nutrition plan difficult to follow?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: No. The approach emphasizes “Ghar Ka Khana” — wholesome, balanced home-cooked meals that are nutritious and easy to prepare. The goal is healthy eating that fits real life without starvation, fad diets, or strict restrictions

Results vary by individual and health goals. Most people experience increased energy, better eating habits, improved symptom control, and progress toward weight or health targets as they follow the plan consistently.
